title: üõ†Ô∏è Airtop tool MCP server üí™ all 20 operations
description:
Need help? Want access to this workflow + many more paid workflows + live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/beyond-nodes-automation-lab-2006/about)

Complete MCP server exposing all Airtop Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 20 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every Airtop Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n Airtop Tool tool with full error handling

## üìã Available Operations (20 total)

Every possible Airtop Tool operation is included:

### üîß Extraction (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Query page**
‚Ä¢ **Query page with pagination**
‚Ä¢ **Smart scrape page**

### üìÑ File (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Delete a file**
‚Ä¢ **Get a file**
‚Ä¢ **Get many files**
‚Ä¢ **Load a file**
‚Ä¢ **Upload a file**

### üîß Interaction (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Click an element**
‚Ä¢ **Fill form**
‚Ä¢ **Hover on an element**
‚Ä¢ **Scroll on page**
‚Ä¢ **Type text**

### üîß Session (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a session**
‚Ä¢ **Save a profile on session termination**
‚Ä¢ **Terminate a session**

### üîß Window (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a window**
‚Ä¢ **Load a page**
‚Ä¢ **Take screenshot**
‚Ä¢ **Close a window**

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Resource IDs and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Search queries and filters
‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native Airtop Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Complete Coverage**: Every Airtop Tool operation available
‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n error handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
